UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: CATH-2-derived antimicrobial peptide inhibits multidrug-resistant Escherichia coli infection in chickens
Literature.Author: Hou Y, Shi W, Chen L, Kong T, Wang B, Chen S, Guo X

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Chicken erythrocytes:12% Hemolysis=64 µg/ml,Chicken kidney cells:15% Cytotoxicity=64 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=1µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=1µg/ml),Escherichia coli E9(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Escherichia coli E9(MBC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MBC=8-32µg/ml)
